question: Who among the following led the movement against Article 370 with the Slogan ‘Ek Vidhan, Ek Nishan, Ek Pradhan (One Constitution, One Flag, One Prime Minister)?
explanation: Shyama Prasad Mukherjee led the movement against Article 370 with the Slogan ‘Ek Vidhan, Ek Nishan, Ek Pradhan (One Constitution, One Flag, One Prime Minister).
